mapper.select:
SELECT at_grp_no, at_grp_name, at_grp_seqno, at_grp_visible, r FROM ( SELECT at_grp_no, at_grp_name, at_grp_seqno, at_grp_visible, rownum as r FROM at_grp ORDER BY at_grp_seqno )
WHERE r >= #{startNum} AND r <= #{endNum}
